ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 232
ygData.msgSnippet: I think for now I m going to stay in Guk, or Rathe Mtns.  Both zones are rarely crowded, and the lower level mobs that I can kill are rarely camped.  I m
ygData.messageBody:
I think for now I'm going to stay in Guk, or Rathe Mtns. Both zones are rarely
crowded, and the lower level mobs that I can kill are rarely camped. I'm
getting sick of the crowded zones. Befallen is OK, but it seemed a bit crowded
for me. My only experience with Najena was when I zoned in and ended up in a
room full of magicians and pets and promptly got killed and almost lost my
corpse for good. I do want to go there in a few more levels though.

Question about Soloing: Now that I'm 16 it's been very difficult for me to
solo, even with a pet. My new level 16 spells use tons of mana, and I end up
either running out before I kill the mob, or coming very close to it. Either
way I end up medding and healing for a long time between kills. It hardly seems
efficient. Any suggestions on soloing at level 16?

-Ezrae
16th level DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis


Andrew Collins wrote:

> From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
>
> Gossimer armor can be found in Unrest, rarely in Runnyeye, but 2 good spots
> to find gossimer are Befallen and Najena. However it isnt as easy as guk.
>
> Im glad to see someone appreciates Upper Guk... I loved that place and Lower
> as well...
>
